metadata.title: CVE-2017-9105 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in adns before 1.5.2. It corrupts a pointer when anameserver speaks first because of a wrong number of pointer dereferences.This bug may well be exploitable as a remote code execution.

criterions.comment: adns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
